bestBHT.bht: This verse starts with a serious call for attention. The repetition of the phrase if anyone has an ear signals the importance of what follows. The second-tier comments underscore the significance of focusing on the information about the beast due to its relevance in the church's history. The third-tier remarks emphasize the need to carefully contemplate this enigmatic depiction of antichrist in order to recognize him, his disciples, and avoid their influence.

Jamieson-Fausset-Brown: Christ's own words of monition calling solemn attention.
Albert Barnes: If any man have an ear, let him hear - See the notes on Revelation 2:7."
The idea here is, that what was here said respecting the 'beast' was worthy of special attention...
...as it pertained to most important events in the history of the church.
Archibald T. Robertson: If any one hath an ear (ε τις εχε ους). Condition of first class, repetition of the saying in Revelation 2:7; Revelation 2:11; Revelation 2:17; Revelation 2:29, etc.
John Gill: If any man have an ear, let him hear.
Diligently attend to this mystical description of antichrist
Seriously consider it, that he may know him, and his followers, and avoid them.

bhtAttempts.bht: This verse begins with a general exhortation, with Christ's own words calling solemn attention to what is going to be said. The repetition of the phrase if any one hath an ear emphasizes the importance of what follows. The second-tier commentaries urge the reader to pay close attention to the words about the beast, as they pertain to important events in the history of the church. This instruction is even further emphasized in the third-tier commentaries, which urge the reader to diligently attend to the description of antichrist and to seriously consider it in order to know him, his followers, and avoid them.

Beginning with a solemn exhortation, the words of Christ urge attentive listening. The repetition of the phrase if any one hath an ear highlights the significance of what is to come. The second-tier commentaries emphasize the importance of paying special attention to the details about the beast, relating to the crucial moments within the church's history. The third-tier commentaries stress the need to carefully consider this mystical description of antichrist so as to identify him and his followers and avoid them.

This verse starts with a serious call for attention. The repetition of the phrase if anyone has an ear signals the importance of what follows. The second-tier comments underscore the significance of focusing on the information about the beast due to its relevance in the church's history. The third-tier remarks emphasize the need to carefully contemplate this enigmatic depiction of antichrist in order to recognize him, his disciples, and avoid their influence.

In this passage, Christ's words serve as a solemn call to listen attentively. The repeated phrase if any one hath an ear emphasizes the importance of what will be conveyed. According to the second-tier thoughts, paying careful attention to the information about the beast is crucial, given its connection to significant events in the church's history. Furthermore, the third-tier commentaries stress the need to fervently contemplate this mystical portrayal of antichrist, in order to identify and avoid him and his adherents.

The call for attention is emphasized as Christ's words solemnly urge listeners to pay heed. The recurring phrase if anyone has an ear stresses the significance of what follows. The importance of focusing on the details about the beast is highlighted by the second-tier commentaries, as it pertains to crucial moments in the history of the church. The third-tier thoughts emphasize the need for careful consideration of this mysterious depiction of antichrist, allowing one to recognize and avoid both him and his followers.
